objectDesc.p: Palm-leaf manuscript. 89 leaves in Kuṭilā script. Apparently written in 1152 A.C.

history.p: In June 1934, Sāṅkṛtyāyana found this manuscript in the monastery of Kun-de-ling (Lhasa).

lg.l: sadya bāma ghora tatapurukha mukha ye īśāna | 1 |
saṅgama mekhaḷī piṅgaḷa nandaka udeka pañchujaṭā
āpaṇe abhogī nātha basilu tuni hoi | 3 |
paramānanda nātha tu para dukhe dukhī
samasta bhoḷe dei nātha na thoilu kicchi | 4 |
dusaha dustaru nātha uddhari dhara mote | 5 |
sugandha dūra kari bibhūti bhūṣaṇa kāẏe

div.note: mama hr̥de gyāna dīpa jāḷa pañchānana<lb/>candra sūryya agni aṭe tumbhara naẏana |(kha, ṭha, na)
buāghracarma mekhaḷīśare śohe jaṭā |(kha, ṭha, na)

lg.l: svāmī prāṇa apāna alopya śirī dyantā
nirekha jana nistāraṇa nātha anāsta jana uddhārantā | 9 |
svāmī bhāskara tīrthe rāmeśvara liṅga dekhi
śrī rāmeśvara liṅga caraṇe muhiṁ sebi
muhiṁ tāhā sañchapi ki kahibāku sāmaratha | 13 |

div.note: kaḷaṁka = cihna |
div.head: {@yadubaṁśa dhvaṁsa bibaraṇa@}

lg.l: bho muni ẏe janmara pāpa muṁ dahili
tumbhara śrīmukharu agnipaboṅg stirīpaboṅg byāsapaboṅg muṁ śuṇili | 2 |
yujheṣṭhi rājya kari rahile hastinā rājyeṇa
ẏethuṁ kebaṇa kath kahibā muni puṇa | 3 |
ẏethu anantare aśvamedha yāgara ye rīti | 4 |
aśvamedha yāga bābu kara ho jagannāthe | 6 |
badaẏanti baḷadeba yāga kara tu ho sukhe
caurāśi guṇa lakṣaṇe aśva ẏeka āṇi
śarīre ābharaṇa kale koṭiẏe kiraṇa maṇi | 8 |
śrīkr̥ṣṇa boile akrūra tu yāa indra praśaste
pañcha pāṇḍabanta gheniṇa tu āsibu turite | 9 |
śrīkr̥ṣṇaṁka āgyāṁẏe ye akrūra gabana bahana
indra praśaste yāiṁṇa prabeśa yujheṣṭhiṁka āstāna sannidhāna | 11 |
śuṇiṇa sānanda ye hoile paṇḍu bāḷa | 12 |
ānande rahile aśvamedha yāga karibe śrīpati | 15 |
sumarante samasta ruṣi āsi miḷikeka gobindaṁka āge | 19 |
tumbhe ruṣi ẏe yāga kara āropaṇa | 20 |
janaka sanaka aṣṭabatra uttaṁka kapiḷa ajapā | 22 |
bho deba yujheṣṭhira ẏe kāryyaku hoibāka sāha | 24 |
ẏe dvāra rakhibāku āna acchi abā kehu | 25 |
bolanti śrī arjunare ẏe dvāra nohiba rakṣita
yāga samāpata kari nuāribu āmbhe ta | 26 |
arjuna boile svāmī āpaṇe tumbhe sabu jāṇa
māilaiṁ muhiṁ bhīṣma droṇa karṇṇa mūḷe
taba dvāra rakhite yogya nohili ẏetebeḷe | 29 |
ẏe bacana śuṇi bhagabāna mane bichārai
dvāre na rakhile ẏe karibanā kopaiṁ | 30 |
dvārapāḷa hoi raha tumbhe bicitrabīryyara nāti | 31 |
dvārarakṣā pāḷaka se hoilāka bīra pātha
lakṣe baḷa gāṇḍima dhanu paśupatra bāṇa hāthe | 32 |
cauda lakṣa achanti yādaba baḷa saina | 33 |
ẏe bidhi chapana koṭi yādabanta gheniṇa ruṣīkeśa | 34 |
kr̥ṣṇa bolanti arjuna tu thibu yāgaśāḷa dvāre
binā āgyāṁẏe kehi yehne na paśiba bhitare | 36 |
āmbhe samaste biśahasra tuhi se śahasradhārī
ye baḷātkāre paśiba tāku pakāibu māri | 37 |

div.note: harihara–haihaẏa |

lg.l: makara māsa śukaḷa pakṣa dvitīẏāra tithi
śrabaṇā nakṣatra se ye bāra br̥haspati | 41 |
siddhināme yoga ye bāḷaba nāme karaṇa

div.head: {@brāhmaṇara mr̥taputra ānaẏana@}

lg.l: se nagre thāiṁ rahi basukalpa nāme dvijā
baiṣṇabī catra bulai yahiṁ sahasreka dhāra | 4 |
yama debatā yahiṁ paśite nuārai bhaẏe kari
antuḍiśāḷaru ke mo putrakaiṁ niẏe hari | 5 |
antuḍiśāḷa madhyaru ke putra niai mohora | 7 |
brāhmaṇīki boilā chāla ẏethuṁ yibā poḍu ẏe dvārikā
ẏe biṣṇura bhmabane muṁ pātaka kali ẏekā | 8 |
brāhmaṇī boilā paṇḍāẏe nuha tumbhe bikaḷa
dukha pāra hoiba āmbhara kr̥ṣṇaṁka yāgaśāḷa | 9 |
dvārikā yāi tumbhe beḷeka bacana māga
ẏethu anantare yāga tr̥tīẏa dibasa hoẏe
bhāriyā boilā tumbhe yāa yā paṇḍāẏe | 11 |
ye yāhā māganti abichanne dianti se dāna
tumbhe ẏebe yāa āho māga putra dāna | 12 |
kare tiraṇa gheniṇa basukalpa bedadhvani kari
ẏesaneka anīti ye kr̥ṣṇa tora purī
chaḍabeḷa brāhmaṇī putra prasabai ke niai hari | 14 |
putradei mohora ye mana kara tuṣṭi | 15 |
tohora bedanā dvija kaha mohora āge

div.note: “brāhmaṇī boilā paṇḍāẏe nuhaṁtumbhe bikiḷa” kete<lb/>pothire bhinnapātha :–
ẏe beḷeka dukha pāra hoiba āmbhara |
a medha yāga ye karanti śrīpati baḷaka guhāri kara abaśya śuṇibe dā śa

lg.l: tuho pratāpa ki na jāṇu mohora dvijabara
abani bhārā nibāraṇe ye mohora baḷathilā
tohora keuṁṇa kathāṭi mohora śakya ye nohilā | 22 |
birāṭa rājye muṁ napuṁsaka ye hoili
śuṇiṇa uttara kumāra paḍai mohora pāẏe | 26 |
tāhāra niūne rathī hoi muṁ sakaḷa sanya nibārili | 27 |
kuru pāṇḍabe baḷa ye samara hoigalā
māili bhīṣma droṇa karṇṇa śalya jadyaratha mūḷe
ẏegāra kṣauṇī baḷa saṁhārili hele roḷe | 29 |
ẏe bacana śuṇina dvijabara upahāsa kaẏe
arjuna bolai muhiṁ tohora kāryya karai pāri
kahasi brāhmaṇa ho ẏebe āgare mohori | 31 |

div.note: bolai brāhmaṇa tohora gocara nāhiṁ<lb/>kisa karibu tāhā tohora āge kahi (ka, kha, ja, gha, cha, ṇa)

lg.l: āho dva jabara kehu aṭai phālaguni
bhārā nibāraṇe āmbhe janmilu mānaba deha gheni | 32 |
śuṇiṇa brāhmaṇa ye bolai tāra āge
yāiṇa phālaguni ho jaṇāa kr̥ṣṇe bege | 33 |
na puṇa putra janmakāḷe sehu niẏe āsi | 35 |
tora āge kisa kahibi pahija mohora | 36 |
ẏeghānti prasaba kāḷe rakhibi tora baḷā
bolai dvijabara ho bahana ẏethuṁ paḷā | 37 |
agnijaḷi maribi ẏe mohora satya satya | 38 |
ẏe chara kathāku kimpe tohora ẏeḍe ḍara
chāla ho brāhmaṇa yibā tumbhara se ghara | 39 |
yāiṇa prabeśa hoile brāhmaṇa ghara sannidhāna | 40 |
dhanu śahasra dhari pātha jagi basilāka dvāre | 43 |
nābhi kāṭi kari āṇi arjunaku dekhāilā | 44 |

div.note: bobāi na mara dvija tu bahana ẏethuṁ paḷā |(ca, ja, jha, gha)

lg.l: janam utsaba dekhi huḷahuḷi dianti yubatī sakaḷa | 45 |
caturtha huḷahuḷi dvija ghare śubhilā śabada
hā hā putra boliṇa brāhmaṇī śokakalā | 47 |
kāndai brāhmaṇa brāhmaṇī arjuna mukha chāhiṁ
tohora upare ye hoibu āmbhe hāṇi | 49 |
chatrīṁkara madhye tu ho aṭu hīnajana | 50 |
dhika dhika tohroa akṣa ye troṇa paśupatra śara
dhika dhika hou ye gāṇḍima dhanu tora | 51 |
ẏeḍe baḍa pratagyāṁ ye kariṇa ailu
ẏeḍeka bharasā ye ailu putra rakhi
ẏebe mohora hatyā ghena muṁ putra kaṣṭe dukhī | 53 |
śuṇiṇa arjuna kapāḷe tāḍai nija hātha
śuṣka kāṭha āṇiṇa pātha sañchilāka roi

div.note: bhabiṣya karma mote kalākake ẏaḍe kr̥ta |(ka, ḍa,)
= roi = rai |

lg.l: bhāḷanti śrīkr̥ṣṇa ye kisa karibā upāẏe
kemante arjuna yhe agnire jhāsa diẏe | 58 |
ẏe mohora yāgata prāta ta nohilā
ẏebe sehi śāpa ta prāpata hoilā | 59 |
ẏete boliṇa asana teji uṭhile debahari
brāhmaṇa mandire yāiṁ bijaẏe deba kari | 60 |
agnire arjuna paśante dhaile deba koḷe
arjuna boile deba brāhmaṇa ke niai hari
teṇukri dvāre yāi se kalāka guhāri | 62 |
muhiṁ tohora putra rakhibi prasabara kāḷe | 63 |
mohora jagante kehu putra nelā hari
āu se lokaṁkara deba jībane kisa āśā | 65 |
āsa ho arjuna ẏehāra putra āṇimāsi | 66 |
kesaneke bipra putra debu śārṅga pāṇi | 67 |

div.note: kr̥ṣṇara bacane ye bisāda arajuna |(kha, ṭha, na, ṇa)

lg.l: mohora āsibā yāẏe dvāra thibaṭi ābori | 71 |
ruṣimāne basi hāde ẏethi karuthāntu yāga
arjuna pratagyāṁ siddhakari āsai muṁ bega | 72 |
arjunara kara dhari keteheṁ dhūra yāẏe
andhara purī jiṇi dekhile subarṇṇa purī goṭiẏe | 76 |
arjuna boile ye śrīkr̥ṣṇa mukha chāhiṁ
adabhmata bhmabane deba paśilu kisa pāiṁ | 77 |
bolanti mādhaba āhe arjuna tumbhe śuṇa
aneka puṇya karithile ẏehu pura hāde pāi
lakṣe yāga karithile hāde ẏe pura se dekhai | 79 |
ye biṣṇu se śaṁkara ẏetheheṁ nāhiṁnā bikāra | 82 |
ẏe triẏambaka nāthaṁkara ye tinisvarge bāsa | 84 |
ẏe bidhi tribhmabana ye biṣṇu nāthaṁkara jāṇa | 86 |
cauda lakṣa juṇa ucce biṣṇu puragoṭi
tahiṁ lakṣe yojana upare ananta śaẏanaṭi | 87 |
śaṁkara kaḷā loka ye aṭai śibadāsa
bho rājana ratnapure ye subarṇṇa koṇakāṇḍa
dibya poẏeḷāẏe hoẏe orā rua panti
subarṇṇa rasāṇilā piḍhā pañchuratne sañchi ati | 92 |
pabitra bhmabna aẏe dekhilāta mora nāhiṁ | 93 |

div.note: cauda lakṣa ucca biṣṇu gaṇa parameṣṭhī<lb/>biṣṇunāthaṁku laẏe deiṇa kare sr̥ṣṭi |(ṇa, cha, ḍha)

lg.l: gobinde bolanti ho jaẏe ye bijaẏe
yāi bijaẏa jaṇāilā śrībiṣṇu nāthara āge
śuṇiṇa bijaẏa tāṁku kahilā bege yāi | 96 |
āgyāṁ pāi yāiṇa bhitara pure paśi
kaṇaẏa āstāne ye biṣṇu chanti basi | 98 |
śaṅkha catra gada padma kaumudī kaustubha ādi
pralambita hoi tāṁku stuti kale beni
uṭhi ubhā hoi puṇa karanti daẏinī | 103 |

div.note: dekhikari arjunara kāẏe ulusai<lb/>pabitra bhmabana ẏe mohoi jagatai |(jha, ṇa)
śaṅkhacatra gada kaumodakī śāraṅga śobhābana<lb/>yogadhyāna tapa dekhi deba nārāẏaṇa |(jha, ṭa)

lg.l: tumbhe ye gala pāśorila ẏe bhmabana
tumbhe sinā gala ho hari baḷarāma | 106 |
śukaḷa kaḷā ye dui ruma upāḍilu | 111 |
ye se śukaḷa heba baḷarāma rūpa
yehu se kaḷābarṇṇa tumbhe se śrīkr̥ṣṇa sarūpa | 113 |
se kāryya sāri kimpe rahila nicinta | 114 |
madhya bhmabanare bhogapāi sarba ye pāśorila
ẏebe yāiṁ bege āsa nohi tumbhe bhoḷa | 115 |
muhiṁ se biṣṇu nātha aṭai ẏekayoga
āsiba yāa bege baḷarāmaṁku saṅge gheni | 119 |
śrīkr̥ṣṇa boile yeteka yādaba achanti mora baṁśa
bāhuḍi yāa boli biṣṇu nātha dile āgyāṁ
svāmī tumbhara bacana ke kariba abagyāṁ | 121 |
bahana yāa boli biṣṇu nātha boli
se bacana goṭi chamure kahai nirbhāi | 123 |
putra goṭiẏe janma ye hoilā tāhā ghara | 124 |
antarddhāne sehu galā keuṁṇa ye ṭhābe | 125 |
muhiṁ yāgaśāḷe deba thilāiṁ deba basi
brāhmaṇa mora dvāre guhāri kalā āsi | 126 |
tāhāra āge arjuna bahu rpatagyāṁ ye kalā | 129 |
nicaẏe satya mora agni jāḷi maribaiṁ | 130 |

div.note: sapata putra janma heilā tāra ghara |(mudrita pustaka)

lg.l: na dekhiṇa brāhmaṇa ye kalāka kopaiṁ
dvārapāḷe mote ye kahile bege yāiṁ
ẏehā śuṇi deba baḍa pāpa ye pāili
āsiṇa brāhmaṇaku ye muṁ bacana boili | 134 |
ratha ārohi deba ailu pātāḷa pura | 135 |
se brāhmaṇa putraku ho āṇilāi muhiṁ | 138 |
se kāraṇe āmbhe ho ẏesaneka upāẏa ye kari | 139 |
ghenikari yāa boli kr̥ṣṇaṁku āgyāṁ dile
tumbhara thāānte kāhiṁ kaḷiyuga heba bhoga
rāmaṁku gheni tumbhe duheṁ āsa hoi bega | 141 |
hari tohora baṁśa akaḷita pr̥thvīki hoiacchi bhārā
tote bāṭa chāhiṁ basiachanti tra daśe | 143 |

div.note: aneka janmaru muṁ duṣkr̥ta hārili |(gha, jha, ḍha)
hasiṇa paramabiṣṇu kahile kr̥ṣṇakaiṁ |(ḍa, cha)

lg.l: yeteka āu se pr̥thvīki chanti bharāhoi
sakaḷa nāśi tumbhe āsa bege yāi | 145 |
na puṇa mañchapure bhoga pāiṇa nuāsa
yāa yāa boli biṣṇu dileka ādeśa | 146 |
sātaputra dile deba tāhāra ye āṇi
janme janme muhiṁ tohora dāsara ye dāsa | 148 |
kicchi kicchi bañchāili sajjana jana bodhi | 150 |
gaṇanteṇa sindhu bāli yehne na sare sarbathā | 151 |
pibante amuta ye śuṇante labhiba sadagati | 153 |

div.note: dekhiṇa nistāra hele kr̥ṣṇa phālaguni |(gha, ḍha)
amāpata sāgara ẏe mahābhāratha kathā |(ja)
div.head: {@kadamāsurara yuddhayātrā@}

lg.l: biṣṇura ādeśa ātmā biṣṇura aṁśeṇa jāẏe
koṭiẏe kalpa bañchāili yebaṇa muni dhyāẏe | 2 |
aśvamedha yagyaṁ dvāra rakhita kehi nāhiṁ
basudeba āgyāṁ dile uddhaba śatrājitakaiṁ rāi | 7 |
tumbhe duheṁ yāiṁ ẏebe dvāra rakṣākara
śuṇa ho rājana mārakaṇḍe baśiṣṭhe karanti āhuti
nārada bichārile harira ẏe kebaṇa carita
aśvamedha yagyaṁ kale āṇi ruṣigaṇa samasta | 12 |
mote na kahile ẏe kebaṇa yugate
jāṇimā yāga samāpata ẏe karai kemante | 13 |
ẏeteka bichāri citte se pitāmahaṁka suta
śata sahasa daṇḍa praḷamba hoi śutilā datyarājā | 15 |
basana kuṇḍaḷa ratnamāḷa dei kalāka pūjābidhi
pachārai he brahmāsuta kebaṇa bhmabane kebaṇa upādhi | 16 |
śaṅkhasura putra abani daitaku kuruma rūpe māilā | 19 |
śrīkr̥ṣṇe bhagati hoi se rakhilā sampada | 22 |
bāmana rūpe kautuke pātāḷe tāku chāpilā banamāḷī | 24 |
putra hoi yebe pitāku kāraṇa karanti
yamara bhmabane se daṇḍa na pābanti | 28 |
pitākaiṁ kāraṇa na karanti yebaṇa nandana
pāru yebe daṇḍa gheni asureśvara mahārathā | 31 |
śuṇi mahārājā tāra pratagyāṁ baḷa sāji | 33 |
konta khaḍaga yaṣṭi rathe thoileka āṇi | 35 |
tarjanti garjanti asura baḷa ye saini
dvārikā sannidhye yāi gopya hoileka śunye | 38 |
duheṁ bāhāra hoile kare śasra gheni | 43 |
lohadaṇḍa kāḷadaṇḍa boli kadambāsura beni senāpati
lohasāra dhanure se nārāja pūroi bindhanti | 47 |
dekhi lohadaṇḍa sukhe prahāra kalāke rāṣa | 51 |

div.note: ‘sindhu ghuñchigalā ho asuraṁka mahādarpe’ pare (ja, ḍha) pothire pāṭha :–
yesaneka sindhu laṁghai kulāṭa
dvārābatī pure yāi miḷile sarbathāṭha |
dekhiṇa daitya pātile bāmabhmaja tāṁkara
paḍilā śahasra yahuṁ bhājilā pañjara |

lg.l: pratāpī daita se kāhākaiṁ nāhiṁ bhaẏe
boile ho bāsudeba kāhiṁ achai tohora gobinda | 55 |
brahmāṁkara aṁśe jāta ye pāṭha maharuṣi | 58 |
se pāṭha maharuṣi aṁśeṇa jāta siṁghikra suta
tāra tahuṁ upujilā asura kaḷa gotra | 59 |
bāṇāsura datya ye sehi kuḷe hoilāka jāta
ẏehikṣaṇi hariba se dvārikā sarba darpa | 61 |

div.note: śatr̥ upagatare jībane kisa dharma |(ja, ḍha, ḍa)

lg.l: nāradaṁka bacana ye deba kāmapāḷa śuṇi
bāhānāda kari śrībhmaje bajra ye lāṅgaḷa
asura baḷa samaste thokāẏe dūre rahi | 68 |
ye yāhāra śasra dhari dhāmanti bahane | 69 |
śāma gada pradyumna tule hoile ẏekamr̥tti | 73 |
pradyumna uparaku bāṇa binddhalā hoiṇa pracaṇḍa | 74 |

div.note: rāgare baḷarāmaṁkara kampai saptapheṇī |(jha, ṭha)
yeheneka śaśīdhara aṭai jaḷaśāhī<lb/>asurānta baḷarāma āborile yāi |(ṭha, jha)
dekhiṇa baḷarāme gale deiṇa kuhāṭa |(na, kha, ṭha)

lg.l: pradyumna upare prahāra kalā sehu nei | 80 |
kāmyaka śara ye binddhalā hoi atibega | 81 |
bahai rudhira ye rome rome jhari | 84 |
dhāiṁ mīnaketana ye chedilā tāra muṇḍa | 85 |
lohasāra gadā gheni prahāra kalā duṣṭa | 88 |
bāṇa paḍante padmana pabanuṁ bege chedi | 91 |
lakṣe ṣāṭhiẏe sahasra aśiẏe bāsudebaṁkara kumāra
lohasāra gadā gheni padmanaku prahāra kalāka asura | 95 |
ghāẏeṇa lohadaṇḍa paḍilā śahasra na dhari | 99 |
śuṇa āho caitana śaambara pura dahilā bāḷakāḷe
manasija sārathi ye neuṭāi nelā ratha
padmeka yoddhā goḍābanti tāhāra ye pāśa | 106 |
śuṇa ho rājane dvārikā bhmabane ye bipattira kāḷe
akaḷita bhmabane paśiṇa achanti asura bīra chāṇḍāḷe | 110 |
sehi prakāre asure baḷa apramita dekhi baḷarāma heḷu heḷu | 112 |
sañchaẏe dvārikā śirī āsi hoilāka śeṣa
bho rāma rakha rakha boli śubhai cahaḷa | 116 |
bolanti baḷebara krodha na kara go māẏe
dvārikā bhmabana ku ke diantā dhāḍi | 119 |
durāntaka asura upare śahasranta nei piṭi | 122 |
brahmā indra rudrakaiṁ ye na kare gaṇanā | 123 |
sātukī atrūra śambakumara tule cauda lakṣa yādaba bīra
gadā mudugara chela khaṇḍā catra kāti

div.note: kope prahāra deba nīḷāmbare |(ka, ca, ṇa,)
bajralaṅgaḷa kare saunanda mūṣaḷa<lb/>piṭante kānaba baḷa hoile dhandoḷa |(ja, ḍha, gha)

lg.l: koṭhāra āẏudha gheni kadambā dhāiṁlā kopamr̥tti | 133 |
dekhiṇa kāmapāḷa pātile bajra ye laṅgaḷa
puṇa amoha śakati gheni asura daitāri
candrābaḷī gadā ye gheniṇa kadambāsur abīra
bañchāi baḷarāma piṭile baja ye mūṣaḷa

div.note: bimucchī = bimukhī |

lg.l: śahasra bighāta yahuṁ na mānilā asura
rāma bakṣyasthaḷe paḍi gadā hoilāka cūra | 144 |
puṇa puṇa prahāra karai datya rāhu | 145 |
puṇa puṇa prahāra karai datya śānti nohoi mana | 146 |
padmana śāmba gada tinikaiṁ dhailāka kope | 150 |

div.note: puṇa puṇa prahāra kalāka mahābāhu |(ja, ṛha)
puṇa puṇa prahāra karante mahāprahu |(jha, ṭa)
div.head: {@kadambāsura badha@}

lg.l: agasti kahile ye baibasuta manu āge
bho muni kr̥ṣṇa gale ye pātāḷa bhmabane
āgasti boile deba śuṇa bilaṁka ādhipati
brāhmaṇa putranta gheni aile pātha hari | 4 |
kāhāri āge ẏehā na kahibuṭi bīra pāthe | 6 |
na jāṇibe yujheṣṭhi bhīma nakuḷa sahadeba
sohodrā dropatī ādikari na jāṇimeṭi sarba | 7 |
ẏe kathā arjuna tu udita karante
yābata kāḷakaiṁ pātha na pāibuṭi mote | 8 |
prabeśa hoile yāiṁ madhya ye bhmabane | 9 |
ẏesane samaẏe muni nārade yāiṁ pucchi | 10 |
aneka saini tule aile dānaba baḷa

div.note: nicinte rahigale deba biṣṇu daraśane |(ca, cha, ḍa, ṭha, kha, na)

lg.l: raṇe badhagale padmana śamba gada kumare | 13 |
nāradaṁka mukhuṁ ye ẏesaneka bākya śuṇi
arjuna bolanti deba dvārikāre kisa kāryya
ṭamaka niśāṇa bāje bijighoṣa ye dāuṇḍi
nimiṣake sanna dhye draśana kalā kaśyapara ātmaja | 23 |
arjunara hāthe ye śahasra dile āṇi | 24 |
gāṇḍima dhanu ye pāśupatra akṣaẏa troṇa beni
ẏe se asura kuḷaku aṭai śeṣakārī | 31 |
baḷarāmaṁku dhailu se na jāṇai kicchi
ẏehākaiṁ jiṇile se kāryya tote acchi | 32 |
timbura śahasranta gheni kr̥ṣṇa kale kopa | 36 |
nidrāgha śra se asura dehare phuṭai
ẏekā prahārake śate śate senā loṭai | 44 |
garjana nāda kari ye mahābaḷī uḍaṅga
dekhai rāma kr̥ṣṇa aceta bhāi beni
kandhe basāi garuḍa amara svargakaiṁ galā gheni | 55 |
amr̥ta āpāne jība pāile śrīrāma śrībatsa | 56 |
binaẏe bhāba hoi baḷarāmaṁku indra ye boile | 57 |
ati baḷe baḷīẏāra tumbhe aṭa baḷarāma
ẏete baḷabanta paṇa tumbhara keṇe galā
asura chara hāthe tumbhanta jhiṁghāsa paḍilā | 59 |
teṇu kari bapu rāmara hoilāka kṣīnna
biṣṇunātha tumbhanta āgyāṁ dile pātāḷa svarge
māẏāmoha chadi tu svargakaiṁ āsa bege | 62 |
rāma kr̥ṣṇa boile āmbhe yibu ākhaṇḍaḷa
asura saṅge thile ye pañchapadma rathī
meda medā māṁsa hoicchi khaṇḍa khaṇḍa
pañchu kośa māḍi ye paḍicchi mr̥tupiṇḍa | 67 |
sādhu sādhu arjuna boli śubhilā śaṅkhadhuni | 68 |
śuṇa āho caitana rudraśareka gheni arjuna bindhilāka ṭāṇi
kadambā bakṣasthaḷe paḍi śahasra hoi khaṇḍa khaṇḍa
rodhire jara jara kadambāsura hoilā tripaṇḍa | 73 |
mohora tule kadambā samara karu śasra gheni | 74 |
tumbhara hāthare ye ẏehā mr̥tu acchi | 75 |
lohagiri parbate yehne śahasra hoẏe guṇḍā | 77 |
rāmara bakṣasthaḷaku sehi śahasra kalā kṣepa | 80 |

div.note: agni jhalakilā danuja śarīra |(ḍa, cha, gha)

lg.l: ṭaha ṭaha hoi hasilā kadambā asura | 82 |
ākāśe thāi ye dekhi boile birañchi
ẏeṇe na marai asura pūrbara bara acchi | 84 |
nīḷacakra gheni māra ho baḷadeba rāẏe
teṇe se mr̥tu ho kadambāsura pāẏe | 85 |
se nīḷacakra dhaile āpaṇe deba kare
śuṇa ho rjana asurara padmeka saini thile
ye se śrīkr̥ṣṇa sr pratakṣe arajuna
sañchapi kahibā muni he aśvamedha paboṅgra bāratā | 92 |
śāmba gada padmana tini putranta gheni

div.note: bhārā nibāraṇe sehu hoile janama |(kha, ka)
sañchapi kahibā muni he aśvamedha paboṅgra bāratā |(cha, gha, jha, ḍha, ṇa)

lg.l: dekhanti yādabe ye dvāre paḍichanti mari
subarṇṇa jagatī pācerī bhāñji khaṇḍa khaṇḍa kari | 96 |
śrīkr̥ṣṇa chāhānte uṭhile sarba bīre ceti | 97 |
tohora pātāḷa bhmabane yānte deba hari
bipraputra pāiṁ kr̥ṣṇa gale ye pātāḷe
ẏeḍeka pramāda paḍilā mora karmara abaḷe | 101 |
ẏe tora saṭa putra niasi ho brāhmaṇa | 102 |
ke tāku jīāiṁ āṇiba ki baḷe | 103 |
kebaṇa mate jāta hoile mora putra | 105 |

div.note: yete pramāda paḍilā kahile tathyakari |(ḍha, da)
ẏeḍe pramāda paḍilā kr̥ṣṇara abaheḷe |(ṇa, ḍha, gha)

lg.l: na cihnili na dekhili na dhaili koḷe
mr̥ta bāhuḍai janma karibāku āna ke hoiba bhārjana | 107 |
putranta janma karithilu sambhāḷa ho tohora | 108 |
arjuna boile brāhmaṇa tu pāilu sātabaḷā
dvārikāku pramāda paḍiba tu bahana ẏethu paḷā | 109 |
ẏe bhmabane paśibāku kāhāra śakya acchi
samaẏe bratibu yebe paḷāa ẏethu mr̥cchi | 111 |
mohora sañchita ẏe nohai āna kalā
asura mātrake yahuṁ ẏe pura dhaṁsilā | 112 |
putragheni brāhmaṇa tuhi ẏethihiṁ na raha | 113 |
se brāhmaṇara putra kr̥ṣṇa kāhuṁ ye āṇile
yāiṁṇa śrīhari brāhmaṇa putra gheniṇa aile | 122 |
tāhāra māẏā deba bujhita ke pāri
se deba tini bhmabane aṭai adhikārī | 123 |
ramyeka bibāde deba bajrāṅga asuraku māri
amārga mārge hoai yāhāra kope hāde
sādhaka bibudha jana cintanti yāhākaiṁ hr̥de | 126 |
ẏe bhūta bhabiṣyata bratamāna tumbhe se sampādi | 127 |
muhiṁ tumbhara dāsara dāsa aṭai janme janme
badaẏanti sāroḷa dāsa mote uddhāra janārddane | 128 |
śirare śobhā tora sapata pheṇī ye kuṇḍaḷī
kāḷe kāḷe deba sañchā ye asañchā

div.note: raibrataka bibāde deba bajāṅga asuraku māri |(ja, jha)
bhīmaku āliṅgaḷa kale deba ye murāri |(ḍa, ṇa)

lg.l: utapatti praḷaẏa nātha tuhi se uttami | 132 |
namanti sāroḷā dāsa uddhara parama yogī | 133 |
agasti kahani śuṇa bilaṁka deśa rāẏe
aśvamedha yāga karibāku loḍanti dharmara tanaẏe | 135 |
aśvamedha yāga kale samasta hoẏe dhvaṁsa | 138 |
hatyā bimocana nimante ẏe mahāyāgara prasiddhi | 139 |
ẏe mahāyāga kale manyṣya janma nāhiṁ

div.note: ẏe yāga kale janme janme pāpa nāhiṁ |(cha, ḍha)

lg.l: baśiṣṭe boile tora dhanya dhanya karma
tāhāra saṅge thānti yete loka sarba
brahmalokuṁ chāṇḍāḷa yāẏe svargare ye ṭhāba | 149 |
boile tuhi ye boilu yāga karibā yujheṣṭhi | 153 |

div.note: tāhāra tule yete loka huanti śramī<lb/>brāhmaṇa heu ki chāṇḍāḷa heu abaśya huanti svargagāmī |(ṛa, cha, ca)
aśvamedha yāga muṁ kariacchi yāhā |(gha, ḍha)
tumbha anarūpe mote yāganika debā |(cha, gha)

lg.l: mote baraṇa kalā biṣṇu garbha satyayuge
āmbhe boilu yebe tu āmbhanta barilu yāge
tohora beḷe ki ẏethaku aṇāi pāribunā ghr̥ta
caubiṁśa baraṣa ye se kalā mahāyāga
mūṣaḷa dhārā pramāṇe ghr̥ta baraṣilā chārimegha | 159 |
mandāagni hoilā ludubudu byādhi helā gātra | 160 |
bolanti baśiṣṭha muni śuṇa ho yujheṣṭhi
agnira prabaḷe se āhāra huẏe puṣṭi | 161 |
caḷi buli nuārile āu agni debarāja | 163 |
na dile indra debatā nohilā bhala byādhi | 164 |
saṁsāra hīna hoilāṭi mohora āhuti diante | 165 |
khāṇḍeba bana dahana kari dilāka mauṣadhi | 166 |

div.note: agni pabane se āhāra huai tuṣṭi |(jha, ṭa)
agni na thile se samaste ludubuda<lb/>samaste hīnabīryya hoile asakata sampada |(jha, ṭa)

lg.l: aśvamedha yāga kale apāra dhana hoẏe | 167 |
pr̥thibī samāne ye lāgiba dhana bitta
dhana sañchi yāgare paśa he dharmasuta | 168 |
rājyaku āśākali ye samaste hoile dhvaṁsī | 169 |
dhanahiṁ sarilā dharmahiṁ sarilā baṁśa hoilā nāśa
kāḍhu na sarai śaṅkhanidhi padmanidhi achai yāra kare | 171 |
baśiṣṭhe boiel ho ẏeṇe dhana ye na aṇṭi | 172 |
beḷa madhyāhne baśiṣṭhe bāhāra pāṇḍabanta gheni | 174 |
śuṇa āho caitana bege kāñchinagre hoile parabeśa

div.note: aśvamedha yāga kale bahuta puṇya hoẏe |(gha, jha, ta)
mohora tule āsa pañchanagra sthāna |(gha, ṛha, ja)

lg.l: baśiṣṭhe bolanti tu śuṇa re pābeni
ẏe parbata gotiki tu tāḍa gadābara gheni | 178 |
śuṇi brikodara kare gadā gheni tāḍi
aṭhāiśa tāḷa pariyante dhana acchi pūri | 181 |
ẏe dhana nei yāgakara boile taponiṣṭhi | 182 |
parara dhana ẏehā muṁ nemai kemante | 183 |
paradhana kimpe āmbhe āṇi tote dekhāẏe | 184 |
tohora upara baṁśe aṭai candra ye debatā
tāhāra tahuṁ upujilā se somanāme potā | 185 |
purarabā nandana ye āẏura nāme rājā
se mānadhātāẏe satyayuga sataralakṣa aṭhāiśa sahasr abaraṣa rājyakale
tretaẏāre bāralakṣa chaẏāṇoi sahasra baraṣa puāile | 189 |

div.note: śuṇi brikodara kare gadābara gheniṇa ukuṭi<lb/>pr̥thira samāne giribara paṛilā leuṭi |(ka)

lg.l: āmbhanta boilā yāganika paṇe hoasi baraṇa
baśiṣṭhe boile āmbhanta jhāgaḍa achai nr̥parāṇa | 194 |
tāhānta baraṇakara ho se uttama aṭanti | 197 |
somabaṁśa rājā dekhi br̥haspati kalyāṇa bāñcchi | 199 |
muhiṁ saṁkalpa kariacchi yāgaku āgyāṁ mote deẏe | 201 |
kimpāiṁ bichāra na kari tu ailu nr̥pamaṇi | 205 |
śuṇa rājana br̥haspati apāra jhiṁghāsi bolanti
nārade boile maruta rājā kisa arthe trodhī
parajākaiṁ abidhi kale āpaṇe hoẏe kaṣṭi
ki abā yāga tuho na kalu mahīsthaḷī
meghabr̥ṣṭi na karanti śasya na upujai samaste huanti bikaḷi | 212 |
aśvamedha yāga karibāku anakūḷa kali hāde | 213 |
baśiṣṭhaṁku muṁ aili baraṇī ye kari
biśvāmitra jhagade hoilā bahuta ye bhāri | 214 |
nārade boile mane na bichāra tu marute
āmbhe yāgyiṁka yāganika kari jaṇeka debā tote | 216 |

div.note: jana prajāmānaṁku kalu ki birodhī |(gha, ḍha, ja)

lg.l: maruta boilā yebe āgyāṁ debā rusi
nārade boile tā baṁśaru jaṇe na barile se karibaṭi rāga
nārade boile tuho na jāṇu rājā kicchi
baḍāi paṇḍita se nāma tāra kaca
tāhānta barile tote nāhiṁ kicchi bāca | 220 |
akṣaẏe bāḷuta se channa channa mati | 221 |
tu ẏehikṣaṇi yāa meru dakṣiṇa pr̥ṣṭhe
tote dekhiṇa paḷāiba se aneka dhūrapatha | 223 |
niuna hoigale tote karibaṭi bahuta kopa
kimpā ailu boli tote deba sehu śāpya | 224 |
tehneka mr̥tti dharibuṭi tu tāhā chamure | 225 |
thokāẏe dhūra paḷāi tote chāhiṁba leuṭi
phuṭiṇa bāṭare se paḍibāka yāiṁ jhuṇṭi | 226 |
tu yāiṁ tāhāra chamure miḷibu khaḍaga bulāi
pratiuttara deba tote kiṁkara bhāba hoi | 227 |
ākāśa gaṅgaẏeṇa kaca srāhana sandhyā karuthilā
marutasena rājāra mr̥tti dekhi se bhaẏe paḷāilā | 230 |
paḷāi kari chāhāṁnte paḍilā se jhuṇṭi | 232 |
dante tiraṇa dhari muni boile rakha rakha
tu mahātmā na māra muṁ aṭai nirekha | 234 |
sanma dhye dekhi cihnilā se dibya badanagoṭi
kaca boilā biśvāmitra śāpe kaḷmaṣāpāda rājā
āho marutasena paḷāili muṁ tāhāra prāẏe bujhi
kaca boilā muṁ baraṇa hoili bho rājā
sambhāra sañchāmāna yogāḍa kari bege yāa yā | 240 |
sarba sampādiṇa tu rājā kahasi āsi mote
śuṇa ho rājāna yathābidhi baraṇa kalāka somabaṁśī

div.note: jaṭā mukuḷa kari kaupuni paḍai khasi<lb/>bābu go, bābu go boliṇa paḷāilā bālāśiṣi |(ja, ṛa, gha)

lg.l: karai yāgabidhi dhaumya prohitaṁka śāhāsra yugate | 243 |
muhiṁ marutasena mote na kara ye kopa | 245 |
āsana kampante dhyāne kaca tāha jāṇi | 246 |
śuṇa ho caitana rājāra mukhuṁ ẏesaneka śuni bāca
tuhi āgaho yāa yā boilāka kaca | 249 |
ẏe durgama pathe hāde rājā tu karibu gamanā
marutasena prabeśa hoilā yāi nija rājye
kaca boile āmbhara mahimāṁ na jāṇu maruta
mana yahiṁ gabana tahiṁ tailokya ẏekata | 254 |

div.note: nabakoṭi janmara bāratā dhyānakale jāṇanti se tripura bāratā<lb/>dhyānakale dr̥śya hoẏe bahmāṇḍa bāratā |(cha, kha, na, ṭha)

lg.l: bho rājana yāgara sampada dekhāile narendra
baḍāi sambharba tuhi bhiāiachu ho nr̥pati
āsa ho marutasena dhana dekhāibā tuku | 258 |
badaẏanti baśiṣṭhga muni śuṇa tuho yujheṣṭhi
marutasenaku boile kaca tu rahithāu gupata | 261 |
ẏehi bhūmire thāānti ho mahā mahā rākṣasa | 262 |
maṇibhadra boliṇa ẏeka rākṣasa ye acchi
brāhmaṇa chāṇḍāḷa paile se sarba bhakṣi | 263 |
satyayuga satara lakṣa baraṣa loha cūri se bhakṣilā | 264 |
bhoḷeṇa bara tāku dile deba guṇanidhi

div.note: ẏehi bhūmire thāānti mahā mahādhara rākṣasa |(ja, ta, gha)

lg.l: ẏehi parbata upare thibuṭi tuhi uṭhi
āmbhara hāka śuṇile bahana hoiṇa yibuṭi | 269 |
nidrāẏeṇa maṇa bhadra na jāṇai kicchi
bhaẏe kariṇa kaca thokāẏe dhūre acchi | 271 |
tinidina hoilā mora nāhiṁ naramāṁsa bhakṣabhojya | 273 |
āja tote bhakṣile muṁ hoibaiṁ sustha
āsa āsa mahātmā tu agyāṇa bāḷuta | 274 |
kaca boilā mote tu bhañju kinā bābu
padārtheka māgibaiṁ tāha mote dāna debu | 275 |
śuṇiṇa maṇibhadra boilā tohora yisa kāryya
muhiṁ tāhā nirbhāra karibaiṁ āho dija | 276 |
dhana na aṇṭilā boli muṁ aili se kāraṇe | 278 |
ẏeḍeke pramādaku kemante ailu dekhuṁ dekhuṁ | 281 |
kaca boile muṁ bhuta bhabiṣyata gyāṁtā
muhiṁ jāṇaiṁ tohora sapata puruṣa bāratā | 282 |
manībhadra boilā muṁ yebe debi tote dhana
ke ẏethuṁ bahineba tuta mora hoibu bhojana | 284 |
kaca boilā muṁ yebe dhana gheniyibi
athabā āsu na āsuṁ bujhibā nā dekhi | 286 |
yeteka aṇṭai tote nia ho brāhmaṇa
tuhi bahana hoi āsibu muṁ karibi ye grāsa
bīrabr̥tti paṇe tāha bahai bhāra kañcha | 290 |
dekhi daśa sahasra daṇḍa praḷamba kalā mahīsāiṁ | 291 |
gajaṁka upareṇa se samasta dhana ladi
aśvamedha yāgakara bege bege yā yā | 294 |

div.note: bīramr̥tti dhari tāha bāhāra ye kañcha |(jha, ṭa,)

lg.l: tumbhara na gale ke mohora yāga karibāka | 295 |
kaca boilā rājā yibaiṁ muhiṁ kāhuṁ
ẏe dhana āṇili muhiṁ maṇibhadra tahuṁ | 296 |
tāhaṛa hoilā ājaku pāñcha dibasa upabāsa
mote bhakṣile tāhāra śarīra heba toṣa | 297 |
tumbhara kāryya nimante aili bege muhiṁ
mohora yibāku se achai bāṭa chāhiṁ | 298 |
marutasena boilā ẏehā na kahanti loke
tumbhe kiṁke yiba maru pache sehu bhokhe | 299 |
kaca boilā se mote kari āśa
na gale dharma mohora hoibaṭi nāśa | 301 |
kaca na śuṇai tāra trodhabhara bāṇī | 302 |
bhaẏeṇa marut rāja nuārai bacana boli
bahuta bujhāi rājāṁkuu kahanti se kaca
kisa tāhāra dharma kisa tāhāra bhāṣā | 305 |
ẏete kahi kaca caḷanti ghora ye kandare
bahana hoi caḷanti ye br̥haspatiṁka kumare | 306 |

div.note: tumbhara kāryya nimante yibi āra kāhiṁ<lb/>satya maṇāiṁ muhiṁ āsichi manibhadra tahiṁ |(ja, gha, ḍha)

lg.l: hiraṇya parbate uṭhi chāhaiṁ maṇibhadra daita ẏe | 307 |
biḷamba dekhiṇa bolai muhiṁta baḍa mūrkha
dekhu dekhu kouṁ pāmara bhojana upekha | 308 |
chāḷiśa sahasra yojana pariyante mo ḍare kehi na paśi
dekhu dekhu keuṁṇa jana maraṇaku āsi | 309 |
āho caitana apāra beḷa rākṣasa chāhiṁlāka bāṭa
na dekhi nirāśe baḍa hoilā murāṭa | 310 |
ẏemanta samaẏe sannidhye yāi moḷilāka dvija
maṇibhadra boilā ho aila ki paṇḍāẏe | 313 |
mātāpitā bhāriyā putra duhitā nāhiṁki tora kicchi
kemante chaḍile se tote mana mūrucchi | 314 |
puṇa āsibāku mane na maṇilā bhaẏe | 315 |
semāna na bichāra boli boilā kaca ye kathāẏe | 316 |
tumbhara śarīra triputi hou bahana mote bhakṣa
moho dina saru tora bhoka saru ho kṣatrībatsa | 317 |
maṇibhadra boilā muṁ kṣudhāẏe baḍa kaṣṭi
tote bhakṣibāku mora na baḷai sata | 319 |

div.note: śrī mahābhāratha śuṇi pāpakara kṣaẏe |(ja, gha, ḍha)

lg.l: mote chadile kṣūdhāẏe hebu baḍa dukhī | 320 |
kahile na sarai ẏethire yete doṣa | 321 |
hoili śānti muhiṁ ye tote kali tekyā
ẏebe tumbhara mandiraku bahana hoi yāa ya | 323 |
maṇibhadra tejyā karante kaca bāhuḍi tahuṁ āsi
bāḷuta parāẏe hoi bane bulai bāḷaśiṣi | 324 |
śuṇa āho caitana ẏeka putra boli bahuta pāṭha paṛhāile br̥haspati
teṇu kari akṣara se bibhaḷita prakr̥ti | 325 |
ẏethu anantare se bilaṁka deśa rājā
aneka dhana gheni se marutasena ailā
kāhākaiṁ baraṇa kari se mahāyāga kalā | 327 |
śrī biṣṇu purāṇa śuṇi pātaka kara kṣaẏe | 328 |
kaca baraṇa śuṇi samaste hele bhīta | 329 |
tote br̥haspati ho paḍilā putra śoge | 330 |
dhanahīna dekhi tāku kaca tora galā
rākṣase bhakṣa ye hoilā to bāḷa
ṇuṇi kari baḍa kopa kale br̥haspati
yāiṁṇa lucile se mandara kandara bhitare | 337 |
śuṇa ho yujheṣṭhi br̥haspati abaḷa hoile yahuṁ
ẏe parbata khoḷiṇa ẏehā bhitare rakhilā | 340 |
aśvamedha kariba se nema ẏe ratna santoṣe | 343 |
aneka puruṣahiṁ ye galā tora bahi
aśvamedha yāga karibāku rājana nohiloka kehi | 344 |
baśiṣṭhe boile tume ye boila paradhana boli
tada nimante kari tohora upara baṁśa kathā kahili | 345 |
tohora upara baṁśe arjita ye dhana
ẏehā gheni tume kara aśvamedha yāgara bidhāna | 346 |
se debara padmapāde lāgu mora sebā
badaẏanti sāroḷa dāsa mukati gati debā | 351 | 712 |

div.head: {@yujheṣṭhiṅkara aśvamedha yāga@}

lg.l: ẏethu anantare yujheṣṭhi yāga ye āropi
sumarante miḷile āsi sakaḷa maharusi tapī | 1 |
paulasti dhaumya purohite bibhāṇḍaka ruṣyaśr̥ṅga baisampaẏana mūḷe
jāṇiṇa byāse caḷanti indra ye praśaste | 7 |
ṣāṭhiẏe sahadra śiṣyanta gheniṇa byāsa tule
śate sahasra daṇḍa praḷambita hoile paṇḍura nandana | 10 |
aśvamedha yāgakaribi svāmī muṁ tumbhara parasāde | 12 |

div.note: ẏethu anantare yujheṣṭhi yāga ārambhile ẏeka<lb/>sumarante bijakele baraṇa yāganika |(ja, ṛha)

lg.l: byāse boile ẏe tohora pūrbara sañchita karma
aśvamedha yāgaru āu nāhiṁnā baḍa dharma | 13 |
rājusi yāga kalu ye tohora puṇyabaḷe
hatyā bimocana kari puṇḍu basile svargaāḷe | 14 |
āsane kampante aile madhya ye bhmabane | 16 |
aśvinī kumāre puṇi karanti sādhu sādhu
gyānara madhye yehne brahma gyāna aṭai gariṣṭha | 18 |
ẏe duikathāru śreṣtha nāhiṁ āu trailoke
ẏe yāga kale abaśya basai br̥ndāarke | 19 |
dharma artha kāma mokṣa aṭai chārinadī
kubaḷaẏā nāme aśva dile aśvinī kumāre
pañchadhātu jāṇaiṁ ẏe bidhi gyānara mārgare | 21 |
pārbatīra nandana se ye kāmadeba kṣetrapāḷa
tu ho yābata kāḷe gaganaku karu rakṣā
teṇu se debatāṁku nāhiṁ ye upekṣā | 23 |

div.note: byāse boile tu kṣatriẏa nandana<lb/>aśvamedha yāgakara ẏebe ude hoi dharma |(ka)
hatyā bimocana khaṇḍu basiba gagana maṇḍaḷe |(ḍha)<lb/>hatyā bimocana heba basiba svargaāḷe |(ja, gha)
pañchabidhi mārgare ẏe bidhigyānara mārgare |(ja, ḍha, gha)

lg.l: ẏekā gamibāku deba ẏe chokhāra bāruśa | 26 |
tahuṁ aśveka deu kāmadeba kṣetrapāḷa bhramibā pariyante | 29 |
yahuṁ se āgyāṁ dileka deba indre
indra debatā mote āgyāṁ dile yāhā | 32 |
bābu kṣetrapāḷa muṁ tote aśva debi
muhiṁ diga bhramai se ketebeḷe pāibi | 36 |
bulu bulu tora aśvaku kale tejyā
teṇu se dinakara nātha ye baranti pratikṣaṇe | 42 |
ḍāhoṇe aśva tini bāme ye aśva chāri
kṣetrapāḷaku se aśvaku galāka tahuṁ gheni | 44 |
aśva piṭhire srāhāna se ye karai gabana | 46 |
yahuṁ se kṣetrapāla na chadilā haẏa
aśva medha yāga ẏeṇu se aṭai ye śreṣṭha
tāhākaiṁ na dekhile bhīma hoẏe ye antiṣṭa | 48 |
tu ey aśva bābu āṇilu bege māgi
sātaaśva gheni se ye birañchi nārāẏaṇa
kubaḷaẏā aśva tora debu ki nandana | 56 |
kāhāri bacane muṁ na dilita haẏe
kebeheṁ bārā śatu na chaḍibu kṣaṇe
na puṇa aśva ye nianti birañchi nārāẏaṇe | 59 |
aśva gheni pāṇḍabe ye ārambhile yāga
pabanuṁ bege gamaiṁ se chokhāra turaṅga
kalpānte na marai se amara yuga yuga | 62 |
byāse boile tuta trailokya ẏeka deba
ananta koti brahmāṇḍe tote keuṁṇa asambhaba | 63 |
aśvinī kumāre ta aṭanti tuma pitā
parameṣṭhi ādikari ke acchi tumara bacana meṇṭantā | 64 |
ẏe aśvara tule ye baragibu kāhā
mohora beḷe ẏehānta na pārai peṣi | 67 |
ẏe aśva caḷai pache yāu phālaguni
āsu rājāmānanta ẏe nimantraṇa kari gheni | 69 |
tu bābu yibu ẏe aśva gheniṇa āna thāne
yemanta bhagati se hoanti bāḷuta rājāẏe
aprīti janakaiṁ sodrimā paṇa hoiba tetebeḷe | 74 |
tebe se kāryya dharma sodrimā paṇa rahai

div.note: asure ẏehānta lobhe bhakṣibe kariṇa prāṇenāśa |(jha, ṭa, cha)

lg.l: āmbhe tote prāpata karāibā dibya cachu | 79 |
se stānaru phaḷaẏeka āṇa tu bahane | 81 |
ye phaḷa icchā tāhāku āṇibu tu bācchi | 82 |
dr̥bhāsā ruṣi sehi phaḷa goṭiki mantrile | 84 |
dibyacachu dile tāṁku hoi kutu haḷī | 85 |
śate yojane tu dekhi pāribu saṅgani | 86 |
nānā barṇṇeṇa ye chāmara maṇḍata bahuta
tathira madhyare ye mukutā bandhā neta | 89 |

div.note: aneka yatane bājī maṇḍile tādr̥śi |(gha, ḍha)

lg.l: lakṣe rājā āṇibuṭi tuḷa bichā dhanu tinimāse | 91 |
yāā yāā boli āgyāṁ dile byāsa mahāyati | 92 |
rudra gaṅgāre srāhāna sāriṇa bīra pātha | 93 |
kiñchita doṣe nātha maẏāṇa darpa bhāñji | 95 |
saṁsāra andhakāraku tuhi se ude indu | 96 |
svāmī caturtha yuga yāhāku sahasre baraṣa
tote hoẏe svāmī sarbe nimiṣa ye ardhe | 99 |
tote yebe sahasa baraṣa deba hoẏe
svāmī birūpākṣa rūpa dharu saṁsāra tāraṇa arthe
ẏe tohora barṇṇa cihna na cihnanti kehi
teṇu kuḷa gotrare nirmaḷa mārga sehi | 102 |
muṁ ẏehāra tadanta na jāṇai sarbasiddhi
kiñchita dānaku tohora na aṇāi bārānidhi | 103 |
samasta paraku dei āpaṇe icchila lāṅgaṭā
yatane bibasanaśāhī se lalāṭe piṅgaḷa jaṭā | 104 |
janma abhyāsai taba caraṇe śaraṇa mama | 105 |
badaẏanti sāroḷa dāsa mahādeba garaṇe seba | 106 | 818 |

div.note: śubha anakuḷe prabhma maṅgaḷa ye tuhi (kha, na)
kiñchita janaṁku yāhāra nāma karuṇā bārādhi |(kha, ṭha, na, gha)
div.head: {@aśva sahita arjunara caturddiga bhramaṇa<lb/>ebaṁ<lb/>babr̥ bāhana saha yuddha@}

lg.l: aśvamedha yāga ki tumbhe acha ho ārambhi | 3 |
aśva lakṣaṇa dekhi āmbhe bichāra ye kalu
svāmī prasanne āgyāṁ mote diasi biśvabāsī
yā yā boli āgyāṁ dileka deba kāśī | 5 |
ẏehāṁkara doṣa tu na dharasi śarīre | 8 |
ẏete boli bijekale yahuṁ deba biśvanātha
tahuṁ aśva caḷāi pātha caḷai pacchima praśasta | 9 |
ākāśara aśva se bhūta bhabiṣyata gyāṁtā
aśva hoi jāṇai se ananta koṭi yugara bāratā | 10 |
se aśva paśilā yāiṁ padmadaḷa deśe
deba bhaṇḍāra subarṇna bhūṣaṇa tāra aṅge
baḍāi suolakṣaṇa aśveka paśilā āmbhara rājyare | 14 |
aśva dekhi rājāra basilāka lobha āga
mantrī amanātyanta gheni aśvaku dharāilā bege | 16 |
aśva pratibākya deba chaḍa chaḍa mote
muhiṁ debaaśva tuhi mote dharinebu kemante | 17 |
kumāra debatāra muṁ aṭai ye bājī
aśvara mukhuṁ yahuṁ śuṇilā ẏesana sulabha
bhāḷai nara indra ẏeta baḍāi dulabha | 19 |
tāhāra tahuṁ maṇḍilā aśvaku lakṣe ratana
aśvamedha yāgaku yāa tora thāṭhasanya gheni | 23 |
badaẏanti agasti tumbhe śuṇa ho baibasuta manu
pabana gatire caḷe se bāsabara tanu | 24 |
pacchima deśe gamai se gahana bana kandare

div.note: nr̥patira agrate ye bolai debabājī |(ja, gha, ḍha)

lg.l: jaẏadeba sahadeba boli benisuta ye tāhāra | 27 |
bitakṣaṇa aśva se aneka ratna khañjilā acchi
yoddhā hoikari kehu se aśvaku mūrucchi | 30 |
aśvaku dhailā ye dumukha sena pati
bārāsakaiṁ dilā nei se mahādebara kati | 31 |
kubaḷaẏā nāma mora mote āṇicchi dhanurjaẏe | 32 |
arjuna bāṭa chāhāṁi se beḷa pañchadaśa ghaḍi | 36 |
dekhiṇa rāja indra se āpaṇe raṇe uṭhi | 39 |
adoṣe nāśa na kara tuhi sanyabaḷa
sanyabaḷa gheni tumbhe aśvamedha yāge caḷa | 41 |
mantrī bujhāilā tumbhe śuṇa ho narapati
ẏehikṣaṇi caḷa tora mantrī amanātya gheni | 44 |
lakṣe rājā kara tule tu ghena arghyadhāra
tahuṁṇa arjuna galā aśva bege caḷāi
apūrba haẏe dekhi dharite karanti icchā
aśva boilā tuho rājana na kara mr̥tuku kaicchā | 48 |
pāṇḍabe karanti ye aśva medha yāga
yoddhānta gheniṇa rāẏe caḷi yāasi bege | 49 |
bahuta sambhare se karai binaẏa daẏinī | 51 |
samadaṇḍa gheni hastināku caḷa ho mahārathā | 52 |

div.note: (dhāra–dhārā śabdaja, arthāt samūha arthare byabahr̥ta)
aśvakanda boilā tuho rājana mr̥tuku na karaṭi bāñcchā |(jha, ṭa)

lg.l: ratha gaja āu nāhiṁ saini pādānti | 54 |
śuṇa āho caitana belāuḷa deśe bijaẏe sarbasācī
debaaśva dekhi narendra mane mane pāñchi | 55 |
aśva boilā muṁ arjuna naṁkara haẏe
aśvamedha yagaku tumbhe caḷa ho mahārāẏe | 56 |
muṇohi yogaḍa kari loḍai ye rāẏe
aśvaku dekhi se rājā manare haraṣa hoi | 60 |
aśva boilā ho āsuachanti pche dhanurjaẏe | 61 |

div.note: pracaṇḍa mūrtti hoi caḷai mahīpāḷa |(ṛha, gha, ḍa)
indra praśastakaiṁ caḷai mahīpāḷa |(ka, kha, na)

lg.l: aśva paśilā deśe aneka ratna gheni | 65 |
se rājā aśvaku yāiṁ dhailāka dhāti | 66 |
aśva boilā mote na dhara ho rāẏe
aśvamedha yāga nimante digamānanta bijaẏe dhanurjaẏe | 67 |
śuṇiṇa sānanda se kṣīra deśara rājā
aneka sambharbe aśvakaiṁ rāẏe kalā pūjā | 68 |
arjuna bijaẏe ye kalā tahiṁ yāiṁ
caḷiṇa yāa tumbhe aśvamedha yāgaku yeteka sanya acchi | 70 |
arjuna bolai rājā tora aśubaḷa gheni yā yā | 75 |
tāhāra rājye aśva paśilā yāiṁ dhāti | 78 |
aśva gheniṇa tahuṁ se caḷai bahana | 80 |
aśva gheniṇa arjuna tāhāra rājye miḷi | 81 |
aśvabaḷa gheni tahuṁ yāgaku caḷilā mahārathā | 82 |
ẏehāku nia yatane pipāsā nuāsai tora kati | 87 |

div.note: mānaarjuna boli tahiṁra nr̥pati |(ṭa, ja, ḍha, gha)
śuṇina pulakita hoilā mahārāẏa (ka, ja, ḍha, gha)

lg.l: aśva gheniṇa rājā tu caḷa ho ẏehikṣaṇa | 91 |
tahuṁ caḷiyāi se bīrabara suta kontī | 92 |
sanya gheniṇa tuho bahana caḷi yā yā | 93 |
se rājyare arjuna ye paśai aśva gheni | 95 |
aśva boilā rājāẏe mote dhaile hoiba aneka dvanda | 96 |
bolai mahīpati mote trailokye kehu sari
ati lakṣaṇabanta haẏe tote kehu mūrcchi pāri | 97 |
bāṭa chāhiṁṇa pātha ẏeṇe birasa hoilā

div.note: (bhāratī–śaramuṇa)
ẏekākṣaṇakare bīra paśiṇa yāuacchi |(jha, ṭa)

lg.l: kāmyeka śare arjuna bege tāṁku bhedi
āpaṇe bāhilā gheni tule caturaṅga baḷa | 105 |
aśveka caḍhiṇa miḷilā yāiṁ arjunara pāśa
kimbhūte saini mora kalu ye bināśa | 106 |
se aśva dhaile ho na sahanti debatāẏe | 107 |
beḷeka na sahilu kimpe ẏete sanya mora māri | 108 |
tuhi yebe sanya mora kalu ẏethe nāśa
tiraṇa rpamāṇe kari kāṭibi tora māṁsa | 109 |
ẏemanta śuṇi hāboḍā śareka ye māilā arajuna
aśva upare paḍilā se rājā hoiṇa uttāna | 110 |
āre raha raha boli ḍāka diai phālaguni | 111 |
rakha ho pātha boli bolanti pātra ye sāmante | 113 |
rājāra śira chedante hatyādoṣa hoiba bahuta
bho deba ẏehāku chadia bīra pātha | 114 |
yāga baraṇe yāuchanti rājāẏe tāhāṁka saṅgate | 115 |
ẏehi bidhāna kariṇa tumbhe rājākaiṁ gheniyiba
dakṣiṇa sāṭa sahasra rājāẏeka ūṇā yugate
aśvanta caḷāi pātha rājānta nimantri sabunti | 123 |
lakṣe bhaṇḍāra dhana tāra śarīre bikāśa | 125 |
līḷāgati kari aśva caḷai rājyara bhitare
aśva dekhi rājā candraśāḷā pure thoi
ākāśara aśva mote arjuna marttyapure āṇi
tini uttara tini sahasra rājā hoile nipāta | 129 |
dekhiṇa arjuna ye peṣile hāboḍā śarabāṇa | 131 |
niceṣṭa hoile ye kāhāri gyāna nāhiṁ | 132 |
yāga dharma nimante pātha na mārai prāṇe
keśa ākreṣi boilā chedibi ẏehāra mātha | 137 |
se boilā anyoanye na kara bināśa | 138 |
daśalaha mukeh bhari rājā paśai śaraṇa | 139 |
trodha śāntikari nimantraṇa yogāḍa dileka phālaguni
aśvamedha yāge yāā tora thāṭhasanya gheni | 140 |
aśvaku dekhi se aneka kalā pūjā | 142 |
nimantraṇa gheni ye caḷai aśva tule

div.note: mohana śare paḍile pāñchalakṣa saini |(jha, ṭa)
rājāhiṁ paḍile daśahasra yojana ṭhāẏe |(gha, jha, ṛa)

lg.l: tahuṁ caḷai se ye bāsaba nandana | 145 |
nimantraṇa pāiṇa se caḷai aśva gheni
nimantraṇa pāiṇa se hastina ku gale
se rājya rājāku pūjākari peśile yāgaku
dekhi madhukeśara nagre aneka utsaba karāẏe | 151 |
dr̥pada nāti dhr̥ṣṭadyumanara suta madhukeśara tahiṁ rājya karuacchi | 152 |
aśva boilā tuho śuṇasi biṣṇu kara
muhiṁ hāde dibabije karai pāṇḍabaṁka saṅgatara | 156 |

div.note: muhiṁ debayāna bije kariacchi pāṇḍabaṁkara |(jha, ṭa)
muhiṁ pāṇḍabaṁkara aśva tumbhe kimpe mote dhara |(cha, kha, ṇa)

lg.l: rājye prabeśa hoẏe dhanu śahasra hātha | 158 |
moheṇa hijabare paḍigale na cetanti kicchi | 160 |
āpaṇe bijekale pāñchalakṣa baḷa ye saṅgara | 161 |
diśai biṣṇu kara aḷakā pati prāẏe | 162 |
aneka bīra tūra ṭamaka niśāṇa bājeṇi
muhiṁ se arjuna sinā aṭai bīra phālaguni | 165 |
muhiṁ ẏe mahā araṇye aṭai adhikārī

div.note: saini niceṣṭa dekhi biṣṇudāsa<lb/>āpaṇe bije kale saṅge pāñchalakṣa bārāsa |(jha, na)
kimbhūta kāraṇe boilu ẏe mohora bārāsa |(ja)

lg.l: ẏe mahā araṇye muṁ aṭai adhikārī | 169 |
biṣṇukara bolai mānaba hoi mohora rājye paśu
ẏekāmātra hoiñ tu kisa ye bharasu | 170 |
āmbhanta cihni nuārila ki biṣṇu paṇḍāẏe | 172 |
tumbhe thila ẏehi nagra bāhija hoi
bhikṣāpātre tumbha ghare āmbhe rahithilu pāñchabhai | 173 |
gautamīki āmbhe ye galu srāhāna kari
bhīmasena ṭhākure ẏethi chāṇḍāḷa baḷa māri | 174 |
arjuna boile mote rahite beḷa nāhiṁ | 176 |
ẏekā jaṇeke muṁ nimantraṇa karibi chāridiga | 177 |
aśvanta gheni tumbhe yāa yā bahane
ẏete boliṇa caḷai pātha ati khare
aśvabaḷa gheni tahuṁ caḷai biṣṇu kare | 179 |
tahuṁ yāiṁ prabeśa hoile nagra ujāṇakānti
aśva caḷāi se rājāku āṇibe nimante | 180 |
se rājākaiṁ caḷāi caḷai mahāaśva gheni | 182 |
kāśīnadī kūḷe deba aṭai deśa matsya | 183 |
uttara kumara putra br̥ṣasena boli rāẏe
tahiṁ arjuna ye muṇohi yāiṁ kaẏe | 184 |
prabeśa hoile yāiṁ māḷaba nāme bhmabi | 185 |
indra praśaste caḷa paṇḍāẏe aśvabaḷa gheni | 191 |

div.note: se rājākaiṁ caḷāi caḷai arjuna bārāse<lb/>prabeśa hoile yāi māḷaba nāme deśe |(jha, ṭa)
se rājākaiṁ caḷāi baḷiṣṭha |(ṭa, ṇa, jha)
aneka rājabidhi karai bedaśrabaṇa |(ṇa, ja)<lb/>(beda śrabaṇa=bedaśarmā)

lg.l: kāuṁrī deśare āsi hoilā prabeśa turita | 192 |
caḷai sehu rājā tāhāra sanya gheni | 194 |
yatane thoilā rājāra ratna dekhi bhoḷe | 196 |
aśva boilā tu rājā na dharasi mote
aneka rājā nāśa galeni mo kathā laṁghante | 197 |
mantrī boilā ẏehāku chaḍa ho nr̥pamaṇi
aśva hoi kahai ẏe manuṣyara bāṇī | 198 |
ẏehāpāiṁ dekhibā āsu kāhāra kete thāṭha | 199 |
mantrī boilā rājā tu na kalu mora bola
kāḷeṇa jāṇimā nā nohibā kicchi bhala | 200 |
ẏesaneka samaẏe āsi bijaẏe bīra dhanurjaẏe

lg.note: māḷabasena boli tahiṁra rājana<lb/>bāratā pāi arjunaku kalāka daraśana |
bāratāpāi arjunaku draśana āsikari |(ṭha, ṛa, kha)
mantrī boilā rājā tu kalu ẏete lobha<lb/>kāḷe jāṇimā ye nohika lābha |(jha, ṭa)

lg.l: sanya sakaḷa padānti māra tuhi bācchi | 204 |
aśvamāne thāāntu ẏeṇe āmbhara acchi kāryya
ākāśaru śara se ye paḍilā tīkṣamunā
ye abā uburi paḷāile prāṇa gheni
daṇḍa sājai se rājā lakṣeka mattagaja | 209 |
khūrpa nārajeka se bindhilā bege ṭāṇi | 210 |
se jenābaḷī nagre babr̥bāhāna boli rājā
bāḍāi dhārmika sehu heṅguḷā karai pūjā | 213 |
goḍāi arjuna ye paśai tāra deśe

lg.note: yantābara, jenābara, jaintābara, gajabara nagra prabhr̥tibhinmapāṭha bibhinma sthānare dekhāyāe |
lg.l: aśva dekhikari ye nele tāhakaiṁ dhari
candra śāḷā mandire nei rājā rakhāẏe yatnakari | 215 |
aśva boilā mote na dhara tu bābu
ẏe sukumāra dehagoṭi tu nāśa karāibu | 216 |
śuṇikari tāku boilā babr̥ ye bāhana
gaja aśva pādānti saini mora dekha
pāṭa aśva napāi muṁ hoithili bimukha | 218 |
rājyara bhitare yāiṁ paśilā bīra pāthe | 220 |

lg.note: “ẏe sukumāra deha goṭi tu nāśa karāibu” ehi pāṭha pare<lb/>‘cha’ pothire bhinma pāṭha :–[ehi pāṭha samicīna bodhahue]
ẏe aśva bulāucchi aśvamedha yāga kaẏe |

lg.l: gajara kumbhasthaḷe paḍi chaichāḍe galā nikiḷi | 223 |
dekhiṇa bāhāra se helā babr̥ bāhana rāja | 224 |
aneka saini gheni babr̥ bāhāna rāje
sātalakṣa saini chedilā arjuna pāśupatra nārāje | 226 |
samare ẏekamukha aṭanti duheṁ ye niśaṁkā | 228 |
babr̥ bāhana peṣilā ye pannagā śara bāṇa
garuḍā śare arjuna tāhā kalāka bhaṅgaṇa | 229 |
kāmyeka śare tāhā arjuna na nibāri | 230 |
babr̥ bāhāna puṇa ābrateka śara ye peṣai

lg.note: manohara śareka binddhalā bīra ṭāṇi<lb/>kāmyeka śare tāhā arjuna bege hāṇi |(ja, ṛha)
lg.l: babr̥ bāhāna rājā ye māilāka śūḷe
brahma śahasreka babr̥ bāhāna dekhi yoci | 236 |
indra rudra hoile abaśya hoiba tāhāra śira kāṭa | 237 |
babr̥ bāhāna tiārai bahma ye śaraku
ẏehikṣaṇi yaiṇa tu māripakā ẏe moḍhāku | 239 |
ẏekai beḷe duheṁ bindhile ye śahasra beni
nārāẏaṇā śahasra ghāte babr̥ bāhāna ye paḍi
byāsa baśiṣṭha agasti mārakaṇḍa biśvāmitra ādikari | 244 |
hr̥daẏa baikulya kimpe mora bicaḷita bhāba | 245 |
prāṇa śeṣakāḷa prāẏeta niśvasa na paśi | 246 |
jenābaḷī rājye babr̥ bāhāna boli rāẏe
duheṁ paḍile ye brahmaśara nārāẏaṇā śara ghāẏe | 248 |
yebaṇa kāḷe banaku gale arjuna baḷabantā | 250 |
khāṇḍaba bana dahana kale yebaṇa banabāse
se beḷare thile patha triẏambaka bane
tini baraṣa rahile pātha hiṅguḷā prasanne | 252 |
citrāṁkura nāmeṇa ye ẏekai śabara nr̥prati
se citrāṁkura rājya beḷe ghenilā marahaṭa(?)
samasta sampada chaḍi paḷāilā marahaṭu(?)ṁ bairāṣṭa | 254 |
citrāṁkura rājā śaraṇa paśilā arjunakaiṁ āsi | 255 |
citrāṁkura pāiṁ mārilā pāṭha samare marahaṭā(?)
pañchaghaḍi samaẏe ye padile tāra thāṭha | 256 |
mahlāra marahaṭa(?) dui rājyare kalā catrabratī | 257 |

lg.note: maẏūra deśara āu ẏeka catrabratī |(kha, na)
arjuna rahiacchi hiṅguḷāra pāśe<lb/>citrāṁkura rājā śaraṇa tahiṁ paśe |(kha, na, ṭha, jha)
lg.l: aneka binaẏa kari tahuṁ pāthakaiṁ ghenigalā
se ulupīra garbhe arjunara bīryya rahilā santāna
pitā ghare rahithile beni ye nāẏekā | 262 |
se putra nāma dileka babr̥ye bāhāna | 263 |
pitā putra boli deba na jāṇanti kehi | 264 |
duheṁ samāna deba nuahnti kehi ocha
mandara lokāloki madhyare tāhāra ye thāna | 266 |
baḍāi sambharbe raja rājya tā pāḷai | 267 |
paḷāi yāi babr̥ bāhāna śaraṇa sampādi | 268 |
ẏeka samare se deba paḍile ye beni | 269 |
byāse boile yujheṣṭhi yāga karuthāa tumbhe
yujheṣṭhi debe boile se acchi aśi sahasra yojane
tumbhe yāiṁ seṭhāre miḷiba kete dine | 271 |
ābara sodara ki muṁ naẏane dekhai
byāse boile tu āu na kara karuṇya
mana yete karma tete tāhāra teḍe kāẏā
koṭi brahmāṇḍe ẏekā kṣaṇake hoẏe māẏā | 276 |
acchi acchi nāhiṁ nāhiṁ yebaṇa puruṣa
ke svarga ke pātāḷa ke rātrake dibasa
muhiṁ kisa sañchapi kahibi tāhāṁka mahimāṁ
se byāsa caraṇe janme janme muhiṁ sebi
praṇapatya śate sahasra sāroḷa dāsa kabi | 280 |
aśi sahasra yojana gale nimiṣakara madhye | 281 |
dekhile padichanti yahiṁ arjuna babr̥ ye bāhāna | 282 |

lg.note: jāṇi nuāranti yāku ādibrahmā (kha, na, ṭha)|
yāhāra garbha antakari pitā nuārilā abhyāsa |(keteka pothi)

lg.l: sāṣṭāma hoi basile arjuna ye dhāti | 285 |
kimbhūta kāraṇe asāṣṭama kaluṭi to śarīra | 287 |
byāse boile tote jiṇilā yehu, pātha
dekha ẏe babr̥ bāhāna tohora nija suta | 288 |
banabāsa kāḷe pradāna hoilu se tohora pramadā | 289 |
ānara hāthe yāhā muṁ prābhaba na pāili | 291 |
putraku koḷe yāiṁ dhaile muni byāsa | 292 |
bege babr̥ bāhāna ye uṭhiṇa basile | 293 |
āgahuṁ yebe tote jāṇanti re putra
ẏetedina yāẏe brati thāāntā ẏe kāhuṁ | 296 |
bhāratha yuddhare sehu prathama dinare paḍantā | 297 |
tu mohora putra sinā ẏethaku kisa kṣobha | 300 |
babr̥ bāhāna bole mote sudaẏā karibā
muhiṁ ye doṣakali modoṣa na ghenibā | 301 |
ẏete kahi caḷigalā se babr̥ bāhāna
bhagati bhāba hoi babr̥ bāhāna ruhāilā dinātini
putraku rājyadei se aśvamānanta ye gheni | 305 |
rātraka madhye gale aśi sahasra yojana
byāse prabeśa hoile yāiṁ indrapraśasta thāna | 307 |
lg.note: kaḷapi rājā babr̥ bāhāna putraku rājya dei<lb/>aśvamānanta gheni bāhāra bega hoi |(cha)

lg.l: nimantraṇa yogāḍa dile nei rāmakr̥ṣṇa sannidhāna | 308 |
arjunakaiṁ gheni dhanuutsaba yātrā karanti debarāja | 311 || 1129 |
lg.head: {@moḍhāsura badha@}

lg.l: dinakare jambodīpa bhrami āsai se buli | 2 |
se mantrī jaṇāilā tu śuṇa daitāri
āmbhe yibā chāla śroṇita nāme giri | 3 |
aṣṭābatra śāpye sehu hoile baḍa bhīta | 4 |
sarasvatī nadī tīre thāṭha ye ubhāri | 5 |
daita pachārai āho mantrī ẏeta baḍāi asambhaba
aśvamedha yāga karanti hatyā bimocana arthe | 8 |
asura bolikari ki na barile mote | 10 |

lg.note: aṣṭabatra śāpye tāku hoilā cintārdarthita |(jha, ṭa)
mantrī boilā asura bolikari na barile tote |(ka, gha, cha, ṛha, ja)

lg.l: gadā khaḍaga konta hāthare chanti gheni | 13 |
lg.note: māra māra dhara dhara pakānti ye bobi

lg.l: byāse bolanti bhīma yāga helā bhaganasta | 15 |
bhīmasena boilā na kara tumbhe bhaẏe
asure bolanti ẏekā kr̥ṣṇara bhaẏaku āmbhe lucaṁ
ẏete boli dānabe dile raḍi ye śabade
aśilakṣa konta gheni uṭhile datye mahānāde | 22 |
datyabaḷa dekhi raḍi śabda dilā bhīma

div.note: kopakari daẏita sājai samadaṇḍa |(kha, na, ṭha)

lg.l: re re kāra śabadeṇa uṭhai māruti
nakuḷa sahadeba beni bāma ḍāhāṇe achanti | 25 |
ārambhile pāṇḍabe raṇa sarbe jaṇa tini | 26 |
gadā mudugara chela catra kunta bāṇa
bhīmara prahārante na yānti prāṇa gheni | 28 |
dhāmai bhāroi malla raṇaraṁkā yāra nāma | 29 |
gadā mudugara ye piṭanti datye atibege
śahasra cūra huanti bāji bhīmasenara aṅge | 30 |
deba śahasramānanta se na karanti bhaẏe
bhīmara bighāte yahuṁ paḍile bahuta saini
rāhu parāẏe hoi ghoṭile jaṇa tini | 33 |
yamadaṇḍa kāḷadaṇḍa debadaḷana naradaḷana chāri senāẏe | 34 |
ẏe chāriṁkara tule chāri marbhmata yodhī
aśi sahasra baḷa achanti dhanuśara sanddha

div.note: pāñcha marbhūta ratha ye asura saṅge gheni |(ṭha, na, kha, gha)
dhāmai rāhura prāẏe raṇe dutīyama |(ṇa)
dhāmai rāhura prāẏe hoiṇa tama tama |(kha, na)

lg.l: hāthara byagra ye kehi dekhita nuāri
ẏe bidhi binddhalā se ātreṣi beḷa chāri | 40 |
puṇa puṇa agni jhalakai bhīmasena dehī | 41 |
yamadaṇḍara dhanu bīra uchuḍi pakāilā bhāñji | 42 |
dhāmanti tini pāṇḍabe yehne banānaḷa bahani | 47 |
bhīma aṅge paḍiṇa śahasramāna huanti ye cūrṇṇa | 48 |
parbata uhāḍe yehne na lāgai bāṇa
tini marbhmata sanya thile ye tiniṁkari tule
bhīmara bighate ye padile daita thāṭe
luhāra benigadā dhari śate śatebhāra tule
gadā bighāte bhāṅga lāka bi kodara darpa | 59 |
puṇi luhāra gadā daita gheni uṭha

div.note: bihaḍanti pāṇḍabe kare śahasra gheni |(ka, ṛa, ṇa)

lg.l: aneka rājāmāne thile indra ye praśaste
keuṁṇa drabya na thāiṭi yāgara bidhāne | 69 |
śoṇita puraku yujheṣṭhiṁki gheni caḷile mahākope | 71 |
bho bāsudebe tumbhe na jāṇa pāganāśa kaleni daẏite
moḍhāsura daẏita bāhilā indra ye praśaste | 75 |

div.note: tuho arjuna ẏebe na jāṇuki tathya<lb/>moḍhāsura daẏita bāhilā indra ye praśasta |(ja, ṇa)

lg.l: ẏe tiniheṁ paḍile ye yamunā nadīkūḷe
rāma sannidhye miḷle aneka datya kṣatrī | 86 |
raṇaraṅga dhandoḷe paśi manthana kale debahaḷī | 87 |

div.note: moḍhāsura na kalā tāhāṁku keuṁ gati |(ja, ḍha)

lg.l: 87 rohiṇī nandana ye atibaḷe baḷīẏāra<lb/>dhāmanti haḷa mūṣaḷa gheniṇa kāmapāḷa |(ja, gha, ḍha)
debagaṇa gandharbe se na yāi kaḷaṇā | 91 |
paśupatra nārāja ye arjuna bindhe ṭāṇi
sādhu ṣādhu dhuni kale ākāśe deba gaṇe | 95 |
yesaneke bāta bighāte paṁku phaḷamāna jhaḍi | 97 |
bho rājana moṛhāsura rāmara ẏeṇe houcchi baḍāi samara
baḷadeba śarīre paḍi śahasre hoileka cūnā | 102 |
baḷadeba upare paḍi śahasramāna guṇḍā uṭhi | 103 |
asura upare prahāra kalaka bajra ye mūṣale | 105 |
lohāra śatebhaṛa gadādhari datya rāmaṁku piṭilā | 106 |
datyara gadā paḍilā āsi rāmara bakṣasthaḷe
ratharu ḍeiṁleka deba sudriśeṇa catra dhari | 108 |
kaumodī gadā gheni tāku prahāra deba kael | 110 |
śrīkr̥ṣṇa gadā paḍanteṇa datya pātilā tāra bhmaja
puṇihiṁ āreka beḷa prahāra kalāka bahana | 115 |
cauda lakṣa ye thile yādaba baḷa
kubaḷaẏā aśva piṭhireṇa bijaẏe bīra pātha
śāmba gada pdmana bāsudebaṁkara lakṣeṣāṭhiẏe sahasra putre
pāñcha marbhmata sanya asura tule thile

lg.note: pārtharaṇa dekhi sarbe huanti cakite |(kha, na, ṭha)
asura nidhane se abhaẏe mahayuddha |(gha, ḍha)

lg.l: nārade kahile yāiṁ asakanda nāme bane
pabana kumāra ye dhāmaiṁ śira jhuṇi | 132 |
naba sahasra yojane indra praśaste yāiṁ kapi | 133 |
lohasāra gadā gheni piṭai datya bege | 134 |
lohasāra benigadā padi tāra aṅge galā bhāñji | 135 |

lg.note: “moḍhāsura carita śuṇa ho hanumāne” pare ‘cha’ pothire pāṭha :–
lg.l: tarjanti garjanti ye prahāra karanti bidhā
pādeṇa pāda chandāchandi hoi paḍile basudhā | 139 |
śireṇa śira paḍitāḷa bājiṇa lalāṭa pāṭi
raḍi bighāteṇa kampilā bhmabana ye tini
cauda kośa āẏatana hata hoẏe bana
parbata ḍiṅgara br̥kṣa sabu hoẏe cūrṇṇa | 143 |
dusaha pratagyāṁ baḍa karai se caṇḍāḷa
re re markaṭa āja pūrilā tora kāḷa | 145 |
nikhiḷa parbate neiṇa bīra puṇa piṭi
bhājiṇa parbata ye galā guṇḍā uṭhi | 150 |
moha teji sahadeba bolanti hanumanta rakha | 152 |
tāhāra māṁẏesa bhiāile se medinīru peli | 158 |

lg.note: “moha tejile sacarācara bhakṣiba ẏehikṣaṇi” pare ‘ḍa’ pothire pāṭha–
medāsura nandana pedāsura nāma<lb/>maiṁṣāsura boli tāhāra anupāma |(ka)

lg.l: naaśa aṭhāṇoi bhmaja tāra chediel nārāẏaṇā | 167 |
keuṁṇasi śahasramāna mora śarīre na bhedi | 170 |
ẏeṇe badha nohibi āho deba kāśī | 171 |
nānādi śahasramāna na bhediba mora taẏe
īśvare boile re suta samasta hou astu
yāhā māgilu samasta prapāta hou tattu | 174 |
āho caitana baradei tripurāri bijaẏe kapaḷāse
prabhmāẏe boile aneka karilu tu tapa
kisa bara tuhire pāilu kaha kauṇopa | 176 |
moḍhāsura boilā yāhā māgili tāhā dile mote
ẏeṇe abadha bara mote dile trilocana | 178 |
brahmā boile ẏeḍejaṇa hoi kiṁpe huḍu
jāta hoile abaśya ta mr̥tu kimpāiṁ tu ḍaru | 179 |
yebaṇa iśvara bara dilāka bābu tote
sehi aṅguḷi yebe paśai tora tuṇḍe
deba dānaba naranāga bahani pabana jaḷa
svāmī tumbhe ye piṭila giribara upare
śvarīra bajra teṇe na marai asure | 188 |
bakṣasthaḷe pādadei āṇilā bāmapāda br̥ddhā ye aṅguṣṭhi | 189 |
moha teji sāṣṭāma hoile kr̥ṣṇa baḷarāma
ruṣi mānanta gheni aśvamedha yāga ārambhile | 194 |
dibya aḷamkāre ābharaṇa kale deba dāne | 195 |
aśva goṭike bhūṣaṇa koṭiẏe śuddha subarṇṇa
aśvake dakṣiṇā diel śate māḍha dāna | 196 |
ākaśuṁ amr̥ta br̥ṣṭi kale sarba digapāḷe | 197 |
aśvamedha yāga kathā śuṇile huai sarbanāśa | 200 |
lg.note: “askanda banaku se caḷigale hanumāne” pare “ka” pothire pāṭha :–
ye bidhi purāṇe aśvamedha yāga kale
ākaśuṁ kaṇaẏa br̥ṣṭikale digapāḷe |(ṭa, jha, kha, na, ḍa, ṇa, ṭha, cha)
aśvamedha yāga kathā śuṇile svargare prabeśa |(ṭa, jha)

lg.l: yama na daṇḍanti ye nikaḷaṁka hoẏe kāẏe
se debīra caraṇe muṁ binoẏī sarbadā | 206 |
parama ānanda māgo para dukhe dukhī
sarbajana bodhinī go sarba maṅgaḷā kāmākṣī | 208 |
jāta anta madhye hoẏe sādhu yāra buddhi

lg.note: yamadaṇḍa rajadaṇḍa śokadaṇḍa yāhāku hoẏe<lb/>aśvamedha yāga phaḷaśr̥ti śuṇante hoẏe kṣaẏe |(jha, ṭa)
sarbajana bodhinī go nāma sarba ye maṅgaḷā |(cha, ja, ḍha, ba, ṭha, na, kha, gha, ḍā)

lg.l: bhmabi bhmabana māheśvarī śūnya āsana nibāsa | 211 |
bhagata jana matsaḷī go haribā sarba doṣa | 212 |
durānteka pāteka na thāi yāhāra nāme
rāhāse rasilā bhoḷā nānā rase bhoḷi
muhiṁ tahiṁ saṭapada hoi pāili makarande | 216 |
